abstract: The Investment Corporation of Dubai has agreed with leading shareholders of a Spanish property firm, Colonial, on the broad terms of a 3 billion euro ($4.56 billion) takeover, Dow Jones reported.
lead_paragraph: The Investment Corporation of Dubai has agreed with leading shareholders of a Spanish property firm, Colonial, on the broad terms of a 3 billion euro ($4.56 billion) takeover, Dow Jones reported.

headline.main: Spain’s Colonial Said to Agree to Takeover
